title: U.N. opens “window of opportunity” to improve space governance
summary: A United Nations official says there is an opportunity over the next 15 months to improve how nations manage space activities to address emerging issues ranging from orbital debris to space resources.

title: Satellite execs call for more data to improve space sustainability
summary: A lack of data and collaboration continues to hold back efforts to ensure a sustainable orbital environment, satellite operator executives said June 13.

title: DARPA downsizes Blackjack space experiment
summary: The Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency on June 12 launched four satellites for a technology demonstration in low Earth orbit.

title: Artemis 2 Astronaut Completes Vision Quest
summary: Jeremy Hansen has completed a four-day Indigenous vision quest as part of his training for the Artemis 2 mission.

title: Op-ed | To Open the Space Frontier, CLD Must Not Fail
summary: NASA’s focus on human exploration beyond LEO reaching to the Moon and beyond is nothing less than thrilling. Last month, the Artemis 2 crew members were announced, and NASA has […]
